pages.text: Poppets are handy effigies which can be used for both malicious and protective purposes.$(br2)Poppets are always bound to an entity.$(br2)In order to be active, they need to be in your inventory - that is unless you have a $(l:bewitchment:tools/poppet_shelves)Poppet Shelf$().

To bind a poppet, simply combine it with a $(l:bewitchment:tools/taglock)Taglock$() in a crafting grid.$(br2)The way a bound poppet affects the entity depends greatly on the poppet itself, so make sure to check out the corresponding entries.
